text: Patra may refer to: * Patra (singer) (born 1972), female reggae artist * Patra Sherani, town and union council of Dera Bugti District in Balochistan, Pakistan * Patra TV, television station in Patras, Greece * Pātra, the Sanskrit name for Ōryōki, a nested set of bowls and eating utensils used by Buddhist monks * Patra, an ethnic group in Bangladesh and India ==See also== * Patra ni machhi, Parsi dish made from steamed fish topped with chutney and wrapped in a banana leaf * Patras, port city in western Greece * Patrode, vegetarian dish from Gujarat, India made from colocasia leave stuffed with rice flour * Prem Patra, 1962 Indian Bollywood film produced and directed by Bimal Roy * Strir Patra, 1972 Bengali film, directed by Purnendu Patri *
title: Patra
